43 #include "include/tapi_lib/tapi_client.hpp"
44 #include <uuid/uuid.h>
45 #include <algorithm>

53 using namespace ros;
54 using namespace std;

56 namespace Tapi
57 {
58 // Constructor/Destructor
59 
60 TapiClient::TapiClient(NodeHandle* nh, string nodename, uint8_t deviceType)
61  : nh(nh), nodename(nodename), deviceType(deviceType)
62 {
63  firstRun = true;
64  // Set the pathes of the config files and load the uuids from this files
65  string homedir = getenv("HOME");
66  filenameDevUUID = homedir + "/.ros/tapi_" + nodename + to_string((int)deviceType) + "_dev_uuid.txt";
67  filenameFeatureUUIDs = homedir + "/.ros/tapi_" + nodename + to_string((int)deviceType) + "_feature_uuids.txt";
68  loadUUIDs();
69 
70  helloClient = nh->serviceClient<tapi_lib::Hello>("/Tapi/HelloServ");
71  heartbeatThread = new thread(&TapiClient::heartbeat, this);
72 
73  // ServiceServer-devices are Publihers, too and ServiceClients are also Subscribers
74  if (this->deviceType > 2)
75  this->deviceType -= 2;
76 }
77 
78 TapiClient::~TapiClient()
79 {
80  heartbeatThread->join();
81  delete heartbeatThread;
82  helloClient.shutdown();
83 }
84 
85 // Protected member functions
86 
87 bool TapiClient::connect()
88 {
89  bool status = false;
90 
91  // Generate the Hello-message/call
92  tapi_lib::Hello hello;
93  header.stamp = Time::now();
94  header.seq++;
95  hello.request.Header = header;
96  hello.request.Name = nodename;
97  hello.request.UUID = uuid;
98  if (deviceType == SUBSCRIBER_DEVICE)
99  hello.request.DeviceType = tapi_lib::Device::Type_Subscriber;
100  else if (deviceType == PUBLISHER_DEVICE)
101  hello.request.DeviceType = tapi_lib::Device::Type_Publisher;
102  else
103  {
104  ROS_ERROR("Unknown type of device");
105  return false;
106  }
107 
108  // Append the vector of Feature-messages to the Hello call
109  hello.request.Features = featureMsgs;
110 
111  // Call Hello service
112  if (helloClient.call(hello))
113  {
114  status = hello.response.Status;
115 
116  // Standard output only on the firt successful Hello call
117  if (firstRun)
118  {
119  if (status)
120  ROS_INFO("Connection established, Status OK, Heartbeat %u", hello.response.Heartbeat);
121  else
122  ROS_INFO("Connection error, Heartbeat %u", hello.response.Heartbeat);
123  firstRun = false;
124  }
125 
126  // We got the heartbeat interval we shall use in response to the Hello call
127  heartbeatInterval = hello.response.Heartbeat;
128  }
129  // If it's not the first connection but something went wrong
130  else
131  {
132  ROS_ERROR("Failed to establish connection to hello service");
133  status = false;
134  }
135 
136  return status;
137 }
138 
139 string TapiClient::generateUUID()
140 {
141  // Genrate a random uuid with the help of the uuid library
142  uuid_t uuidt;
143  char uuid_array[37];
144  string uuid_string;
145  uuid_generate_random(uuidt);
146 
147  // Convert the uuid to a char-array
148  uuid_unparse(uuidt, uuid_array);
149 
150  // Now convert the char array to a string
151  uuid_string = uuid_array;
152 
153  // Replace dashes by underscores since ros doesn't allow to use dashes in topic names
154  replace(uuid_string.begin(), uuid_string.end(), '-', '_');
155 
156  return uuid_string;
157 }
158 
159 void TapiClient::heartbeat()
160 {
161  while (ros::ok())
162  {
163  // Reconnect every "heartbeatInterval" ms or WAIT_MS_ON_ERROR ms if there was an error
164  bool success = false;
165  success = connect();
166  if (!success)
167  {
168  this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(WAIT_MS_ON_ERROR));
169  continue;
170  }
171  else
172  this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(heartbeatInterval));
173  }
174 }
175 
176 string TapiClient::getNextFeatureUUID()
177 {
178  // Try to respond with the next uuid if there are still enough in our vector
179  string uuid;
180  if (featureMsgs.size() < featureUUIDs.size())
181  uuid = featureUUIDs[featureMsgs.size()];
182 
183  // There are not enough feature uuids left, so generate one and also append it to the config file of feature uuids
184  else
185  {
186  uuid = generateUUID();
187  ofstream uuidFileOutput;
188  uuidFileOutput.open(filenameFeatureUUIDs, ios::app);
189  featureUUIDs.push_back(uuid);
190  uuidFileOutput << uuid << "\n";
191  uuidFileOutput.close();
192  }
193  return uuid;
194 }
195 
196 // Private member functions
197 
198 void TapiClient::loadUUIDs()
199 {
200  // Read (or generate, if not existing) Device-UUID
201  string uuid;
202  ifstream uuidFileInput;
203  uuidFileInput.open(filenameDevUUID);
204  if (uuidFileInput.is_open())
205  {
206  getline(uuidFileInput, uuid);
207  }
208  uuidFileInput.close();
209  if (uuid.empty())
210  {
211  ofstream uuidFileOutput;
212  uuidFileOutput.open(filenameDevUUID);
213  uuid = generateUUID();
214  uuidFileOutput << uuid;
215  uuidFileOutput.close();
216  }
217  this->uuid = uuid;
218 
219  // Now also look for Feature-UUIDs
220  uuidFileInput.open(filenameFeatureUUIDs);
221  if (uuidFileInput.is_open())
222  {
223  featureUUIDs.clear();
224  while (getline(uuidFileInput, uuid))
225  featureUUIDs.push_back(uuid);
226  }
227  uuidFileInput.close();
228  return;
229 }
230 }
